find_wallets_sql:
{"query": "SELECT 
  wallet_address
FROM solcatcher.sol_stablecoin_profiles
WHERE trade_entry_price IS NOT NULL
  
GROUP BY wallet_address
HAVING 
  COUNT(*) >= 50
  AND (SUM(CASE 
    WHEN highest_price_reached IS NOT NULL 
         AND trade_entry_price IS NOT NULL
         AND trade_entry_price != 0
    THEN CASE 
      WHEN (highest_price_reached * (1.0 - (COALESCE(threshold, 0.30) / 10000.0)) - trade_entry_price) / trade_entry_price > 0 
      THEN 1 
      ELSE 0 
    END
    ELSE 0
  END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)) > 99;"}
name: 10 trades in 2 seconds bigger range 40 decrease 20 hi fall
description: 1 trade per cycle / decrease threshold 5 / Long: total_trades >= 50 / win_rate_pct > 99

find_wallets_sql:
{"query": "SELECT 
	wallet_address,
    count(id) as total_trades
    FROM solcatcher.sol_stablecoin_trades 
    group by wallet_address
    order by count(id) desc limit 50"}

FROM solcatcher.sol_stablecoin_profiles

    WHEN highest_price_reached IS NOT NULL

    THEN CASE

find_wallets_sql:
{"query": "SELECT 
  wallet_address,
  COUNT(*) as total_trades,
  SUM(CASE 
    WHEN highest_price_reached IS NOT NULL 
         AND trade_entry_price IS NOT NULL
         AND trade_entry_price > 0
         AND (highest_price_reached * (1.0 - (COALESCE(threshold, 30) / 10000.0)) - trade_entry_price) / trade_entry_price > 0
    THEN 1 
    ELSE 0 
  END) as profitable_trades,
  (SUM(CASE 
    WHEN highest_price_reached IS NOT NULL 
         AND trade_entry_price IS NOT NULL
         AND trade_entry_price > 0
         AND (highest_price_reached * (1.0 - (COALESCE(threshold, 30) / 10000.0)) - trade_entry_price) / trade_entry_price > 0
    THEN 1 
    ELSE 0 
  END) * 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)) as win_rate_pct
FROM solcatcher.sol_stablecoin_profiles
WHERE trade_entry_price IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY wallet_address
HAVING 
  COUNT(*) >= 50
  AND win_rate_pct > 99"}
name: Mr Steinmetz

find_wallets_sql:
{"query": "SELECT 
  wallet_address
FROM solcatcher.sol_stablecoin_profiles
WHERE trade_entry_price IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY wallet_address
HAVING 
  COUNT(*) >= 50
  AND (SUM(CASE 
    WHEN highest_price_reached IS NOT NULL 
         AND trade_entry_price IS NOT NULL
         AND trade_entry_price != 0
    THEN CASE 
      WHEN (highest_price_reached * (1.0 - (COALESCE(threshold, 0.30) / 10000.0)) - trade_entry_price) / trade_entry_price > 0 
      THEN 1 
      ELSE 0 
    END
    ELSE 0
  END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) > 60)"}

pattern_validator: {"stages": [{"all": [{"op": ">=", "agg": "avg", "value": 55, "metric": "transactions.buy_trade_pct", "lookback_min": 10}, {"op": ">=", "agg": "avg", "value": 40, "metric": "transactions.whale_volume_pct", "lookback_min": 10}, {"op": ">=", "agg": "avg", "value": 75, "metric": "transactions.perp_dominance_pct", "lookback_min": 10}, {"op": "<=", "agg": "avg", "value": 0.2, "metric": "price_movements.price_vs_ma5_pct", "lookback_min": 10}], "name": "setup", "description": "Absorption and coiling structure (first ~10 minutes)."}, {"all": [], "any": [{"op": ">=", "agg": "diff", "value": 3000, "metric": "order_book.net_flow_5m"}, {"op": ">=", "agg": "last", "value": 0.25, "metric": "transactions.buy_sell_pressure"}, {"op": ">=", "agg": "last", "value": 2, "metric": "order_book.aggression_ratio"}], "name": "trigger", "description": "Flow shift and aggression increase (last 3 minutes).", "window_override": {"lookback_min": 3}, "at_minute_from_end": 3}, {"all": [{"op": ">=", "agg": "diff", "value": 0.05, "metric": "price_movements.close_price"}, {"op": ">=", "agg": "last", "value": 0.2, "metric": "transactions.buy_sell_pressure"}], "name": "confirm", "description": "Breakout validation in final minute.", "window_override": {"lookback_min": 1}, "at_minute_from_end": 1}], "window": {"minutes": 15}, "decision": {"logic": "ALL_STAGES_PASS", "on_fail": "NO_GO", "on_pass": "GO"}}
